definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
early or late/priority/in succession/one after another
to take the lead/to show initiative

sentences.english: The couple arrived at a plain first.
sentences.chinese: 這對夫婦先來到一個平原。

sentences.english: If there are chaos in the society, your planning cannot precede them.
sentences.chinese: 人道沒有出現禍亂的時候，不可先策劃興師。

sentences.english: They cant change a light bulb or without making a sketch.
sentences.chinese: 他們連燈泡都不會換，或者至少要先畫個草圖。

sentences.english: And we scheduled it and we get it and my dad and my sister would help trim it.
sentences.chinese: 先做安排然後實踐，爸爸和姐姐會幫忙修剪聖誕樹。

sentences.english: Then the nail must be straightened before it can be hammered into place correctly.
sentences.chinese: 於是在把釘子正確地釘入之前，需要先弄直它。

sentences.english: He needs to improve his English before he can study abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他到國外唸書之前必須先加強英文。

sentences.english: Let me get down some information about your apartment first. Whatis yourpropertysaddress?
sentences.chinese: 讓我先記錄一些關於你的房子的資料。

sentences.english: You have reviewed the cash flow statement before investment decision is made.
sentences.chinese: 在進行投資決定前，你會先詳閱綜合現金流量表。

sentences.english: My system is whatever's inside the box.
Before you drop the bafl into the spinntng well, you bet a number on the layout.
sentences.chinese: 在你把小球投入轉盤之前，先在佈局上賭個號碼。

sentences.english: I have mixed thoughts on the D-ring which Maxpedition has been using for a while.
sentences.chinese: 我一直對馬蓋先使用的這個D環設計有更多的想法。

sentences.english: To get that figure, look at the figures before seasonal adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 爲了得到這個數字，我們先來看下季節調動的情況。

sentences.english: He who would lead must first command himself.
sentences.chinese: 欲領導他人的人必須先統御自己。

sentences.english: The guy warned me that you have to knock on the door first to scatter them away.
sentences.chinese: 店員警告我說開門前最好先敲敲門，以便把它們嚇跑。

sentences.english: To reduce memory usage, start by identifying the largest consumers of memory.
sentences.chinese: 爲了減少內存消耗，先要找出內存的消耗大戶。

definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
